member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.EndWith(VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler,System.Action{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseNotification})
member.summary: Calls the given action once the handler is finished.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.ContinueWith(VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler)
member.summary: Creates a handler which will return the second handler once the first one is finished.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.ContinueWith(VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler,System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call and return the handler of the given continuation once the first handler is finished.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.InParallelWith(VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler)
member.summary: Creates a handler which runs both given handlers in parallel. As soon as one of them is finished the other one will be returned.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.InSyncWith(VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler)
member.summary: Creates a handler which runs both given handlers in parallel. As soon as one of them changes, the changed one will be returned. left has priority of both change on the same event. Is any of the handlers finishes, the other is returned.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.OnDown(System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseDownNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given continuation once a mouse down was observed.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.OnMove(System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseMoveNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given continuation once a mouse move was observed.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.OnUp(System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseUpNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given continuation once a mouse up was observed.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.WhileAny(System.Func{VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler,VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Create a handler which will call the given continuation as long as any mouse actions are observed. In order to stay in the loop the continuation needs to return the given handler. In order to exit the loop the continuation needs to return null.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.WhileMove(System.Func{VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler,VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseMoveNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Create a handler which will call the given continuation as long as mouse moves are observed. In order to stay in the move loop the continuation needs to return the given handler. In order to exit the move loop the continuation needs to return null.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.OnClick(System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseClickNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given continuation once a mouse click was observed.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.OnWheel(System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseWheelNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given continuation once a mouse click was observed.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.OnDoubleClick(System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseClickNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given continuation once a mouse double click was observed.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.OnDragStart(System.Func{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseDownNotification,VL.YAUI.IMouseHandler})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given continuation once the start of a mouse drag was observed.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.Drag(System.Action{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseMoveNotification,Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given action as long as the mouse moves. Use together with OnDragStart and EndWith in order to setup proper initialization and finalization code.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.Handler.Select(VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseDownNotification,System.Action{VL.Lib.IO.Notifications.MouseMoveNotification,Stride.Core.Mathematics.RectangleF})
member.summary: Creates a handler which will call the given action as long as the mouse moves. Use together with OnDragStart and EndWith in order to setup proper initialization and finalization code.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.RectangleExtensions.GetUnitRect(Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2)
member.summary: Gets a unit rect from a center position.

member.name: M:VL.YAUI.RectangleExtensions.GetRect(Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2,Stride.Core.Mathematics.Vector2)
member.summary: Gets a rect with from given center and size
